title: Test

summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing American Presidents, and Monthly average change in private sector jobs in thousand in each American Presidents on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Bill Clinton where Monthly average change in private sector jobs in thousand is 214.0.
The lowest category is found at George W. Bush where Monthly average change in private sector jobs in thousand is 6.0.
The highest value at Bill Clinton is almost 35.67 times larger than the minimum value of George W. Bush.
